short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebAccessPro is a multi-browser extension that can be used to analyze websites for accessibility issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Access Pro is a chrome extension used to analyze websites for accessibility errors so that they can be fixed. Errors are classified as minor, moderate, serious, and critical so that a developer can prioritize what should be remediated first. Websites can then be made compliant to current accessibility standards.
